harvest.text.message: Reveal the top 4 cards of your/ndeck, then discard them./n+/c01 per differently named/ncard revealed.

fortuneTeller.text.message: +/c02/nEach other player reveals cards/nfrom the top of his deck until/nhe reveals a Victory or Curse/ncard. He puts it on top and/ndiscards the other revealed cards.

sirMartin.text.message: /f30/t1+2 Buys/n/t0/f24/h-1Each other player reveals the top/n2 cards of his deck, trashes one/nof them costing from /c03 to /c06,/nand discards the rest. If a Knight is/ntrashed by this, trash this card.

chapel.text.message: /f18あなたの手札から最大4枚までの/nカードを、廃棄する。

squire.text.message: +/c01/n/h-1/f23Choose one: +2 Actions; or +2 Buys;/n/h00or gain a Silver./lWhen you trash this,/ngain an Attack card.

bandOfMisfits.text.message: /f23/h-1Play this as if it were an Action card in/nthe Supply costing less than it that you/nchoose./nThis is that card until it leaves play.

possession.text.message: /f20/s22The player to your left takes an extra/n turn after this one, in which you can see/nall cards he can and make all decisions/nfor him./nAny cards he would gain on that turn,/nyou gain instead; any cards of his that/nare trashed are set aside and returned to/nhis discard pile at end of turn.

jackOfAllTrades.text.message: Gain a Silver./nLook at the top card of your deck;/ndiscard it or put it back./n/h-1Draw until you have 5 cards in hand./nYou may trash a card from your hand/nthat is not a Treasure.

ironworks.text.message: Gain a card costing up to /c04./nIf it is an.../nAction Card, +1 Action/nTreasure Card, +/c01/nVictory Card, +1 Card

grandMarket.text.message: /f28/s27/t1+1 Card/n+1 Action/n+1 Buy/n+/c02/l/f24/t0/s20You can't buy this if you have/nany Copper in play.

hoard.text.message: /C02/lWhile this is in play, when you/nbuy a Victory card, gain a Gold.

steward.text.message: /f25/h-1Choose one: +2 Cards; or +/c02;/nor trash 2 cards from your hand.

fortress.text.message:
/f30/t1+1 Card/n+2 Actions/l/f24/t0/n
When you trash this, put it into/nyour hand.

rabble.text.message: /f30/t1/s60+3 Cards/n/f23/t0/s24Each other player reveals the top/n3 cards of his deck, discards the/nrevealed Actions and Treasures,/nand puts the rest back on top/nin any order he chooses.

feodum.text.message: /h-1Worth 1/v for every 3 Silvers/nin your deck (round down)./lWhen you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.

city.text.message: /f30/t1+1 Card/n+2 Actions/s40/n/f23/t0If there are one or more empty/n/s20Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are/s40/ntwo or more,+/c01and +1 Buy.

scryingPool.text.message:
/f30/s60/t1+1 Action/f20/s22/t0/n/h-1
Each player (including you) reveals the top/ncard of his deck and either discards it or puts/nit back, your choice. Then reveal cards from/nthe top of your deck until you reveal one/n that isn’t an Action./nPut all of your revealed cards into your hand.

festival.text.message: /f30/s35/t1+2 アクション/n+1 カードを購入/n +/c02

princess.text.message:
/s50/f30/t1+1 Buy/l/f24/t0/s24/n/h-1
While this is in play, cards cost/c02/nless, but not less than/c00./n/t2/s50(This is not in the Supply.)

mountebank.text.message: +/c02/s60/nEach other player may discard/n/s01a Curse. If he doesn't, he gains/n/s60a Curse and a Copper.

mystic.text.message:
/f30/t1+1 Action/n
+/c02/n/t0/f24/h-1Name a card./nReveal the top card of your deck./nIf it’s the named card, put it into/nyour hand.

loan.text.message: /C01/f23/n/h-1When you play this, reveal cards from/nyour deck until you reveal a Treasure./nDiscard it or trash it./nDiscard the other cards.

witch.text.message: /f30/s50/t1+2 Cards/n/t0/f24Each other player/s01/ngains a Curse card.

vault.text.message: /f30/t1/s70+2 Cards/n/t0/s24/f24Discard any number of cards./n+/c01 per card discarded./n/s30Each other player may discard 2/ncards. If he does, he draws a card.

procession.text.message: /h-1/s32You may play an Action card from/nyour hand twice. Trash it. Gain an/nAction card costing exactly/c01/nmore than it.

duchess.text.message: +/c02/n/h-1/s26Each player (including you) looks/nat the top card of his deck, and/ndiscards it or puts it back./lIn games using this, when you gain/na Duchy, you may gain a Duchess.

venture.text.message: /C01/n/f22/s24When you play this, reveal cards/nfrom your deck until you reveal a/nTreasure. Discard the other cards./nPlay that Treasure.

torturer.text.message: /f30/t1/s60+3 Cards/n/t0/f24/s28Each other player chooses one:/nhe discards 2 cards; or he gains/na Curse card, putting it in/nhis hand.

adventurer.text.message: /f18/s22あなたの山札から財宝カード2枚が/n公開されるまで、カードを公開する。/n公開した財宝カード2枚を手札に/n加え、他の公開したカードは捨て札/nに置く。

trader.text.message: /s26Trash a card from your hand./nGain a number of Silvers equal to/nits cost in coins./lWhen you would gain a card, you/nmay reveal this from your hand./nIf you do, instead, gain a Silver.

menagerie.text.message: /s50/f30/t1+1 Action/s30/n/f24/t0/nReveal your hand./nIf there are no duplicate cards/nin it, +3 Cards./nOtherwise, +1 Card.

pirateShip.text.message: /f22/s21Choose one: Each other player/nreveals the top 2 cards of his deck,/ntrashes a revealed Treasure that/nyou choose, discards the rest, and/nif anyone trashed a Treasure you/ntake a Coin token; or, +/c01 per/nCoin token you've taken with/nPirate Ships this game.

sirDestry.text.message:
/f30/t1+2 Cards/n/f24/t0/h-1/s25
Each other player reveals the top/n2 cards of his deck, trashes one/nof them costing from /c03 to /c06,/nand discards the rest. If a Knight is/ntrashed by this, trash this card.

storeroom.text.message: /f32/t1+1 Buy/f24/n/t0Discard any number of cards./n+1 Card per card discarded./nDiscard any number of cards./n/f21/h-1+/c01 per card discarded the second time.

knights.text.message: /h-1/f23Shuffle the Knight pile before each/ngame with it. Keep it face down/nexcept for the top card, which is the/nonly one that can be bought or gained.

envoy.text.message: Reveal the top 5 cards of your/ndeck. The player to your left/nchooses one for you to discard./nDraw the rest.

foolsGold.text.message: /f21/s24/h-1If this is the first time you played/na Fool’s Gold this turn, this is worth/n/c01, otherwise it’s worth/c04./nWhen another player gains a Province,/nyou may trash this from your hand./nIf you do, gain a Gold, putting it on/nyour deck.

spiceMerchant.text.message: /h-1You may trash a Treasure from your/n/h00hand. If you do, choose one:/n+2 Cards and +1 Action;/nor +/c02 and +1 Buy.

royalSeal.text.message: /C02/lWhile this is in play, when you/n gain a card, you may put that/ncard on top of your deck.

nobleBrigand.text.message: +/c01/n/h-1/s22When you buy this or play it, each/nother player reveals the top 2 cards/nof his deck, trashes a revealed Silver/nor Gold you choose, and discards/nthe rest. If he didn’t reveal/na Treasure, he gains a Copper./nYou gain the trashed cards.

huntingGrounds.text.message: /f30/t1+4 Cards/t0/f24/lWhen you trash this card,/ngain a Duchy or 3 Estates.

armory.text.message: Gain a card costing up to /c04,/nputting it on top of your deck.

marauder.text.message: /h-1Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile./nEach other player gains a Ruins.

expand.text.message: Trash a card from your hand./nGain a card costing up to /c03/nmore than the trashed card.

talisman.text.message: /C01/l/f22/s18While this is in play, when you buy/na card costing/c04or less that is not/na Victory card, gain a copy of it.

masquerade.text.message: /f30/t1/s60+2 Cards/n/f24/t0/s24Each player passes a card from/nhis hand to the left at once./nThen you may trash a card/nfrom your hand.

moat.text.message: /f30/t1/s23+2 Cards/t0/f24/lWhen another player plays/nan Attack card, you may/nreveal this from your hand./nIf you do, you are unaffected/nby that Attack.

alchemist.text.message:
/f30/t1+2 Cards/n+1 Action/f24/t0/l
When you discard this from play,/nyou may put this on top of your/ndeck if you have a Potion in play.

explorer.text.message: /s26You may reveal a Province/ncard from your hand. If you/ndo, gain a Gold card, putting/nit into your hand. Otherwise,/ngain a Silver card, putting/nit into your hand.

contraband.text.message: /C03/n/t1/f30+1 Buy/n/f24/t0/s25When you play this, the player/nto your left names a card./nYou can't buy that card this turn.

apothecary.text.message:
/f30/s32/t1+1 Card/n+1 Action/f24/t0/s28/n/h-1
Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck./n/h00Put the revealed Coppers and/n/h-1Potions into your hand. Put the other/n/h00cards back on top in any order.

chancellor.text.message: +/c02/n/f18/s50あなたの山札のカードすべてを、/s10/n即座に捨て札に置くことができる。

haven.text.message: /f30/t1+1 Card/n+1 Action/n/f24/t0/s26 /nSet aside a card from your hand/nface down. At the start of your/nnext turn, put it into your hand.

lighthouse.text.message: /f30/t1/s45+1 Action/f24/t0/n/s10Now and at the start of/nyour next turn: +/c01/f22/s21/lWhile this is in play, when another/nplayer plays an Attack card, it/ndoesn't affect you.

fishingVillage.text.message: /f30/t1/s28+2 Actions/n+/c01/n/f24/t0/s14 /nAt the start of your next turn/n /f30/t1/s26/n+1 Action/n+/c01

apprentice.text.message: /f30/s50/t1+1 Action/n/t0/f24/s24Trash a card from your hand./n+1 Card per /c-1 it costs./n+2 Cards if it has /p in its cost.

smugglers.text.message: /s23/f26Gain a copy of a card/n costing up to /c06 that/nthe player to your right/n/s50gained on his last turn.

count.text.message: /h-1 /nChoose one: Discard 2 cards; or put/na card from your hand on top of your/ndeck; or gain a Copper./nChoose one: +/c03; or trash your/nhand; or gain a Duchy.

workshop.text.message: Gain a card costing up to /c04.

remodel.text.message: Trash a card from your hand./n Gain a card costing up to/n/c02 more than the trashed card.

merchantShip.text.message: /f26Now and at the start/nof your next turn, +/c02.

vineyard.text.message: /h-1Worth 1/v for every 3 Action cards/nin your deck (rounded down).

governor.text.message: /f30/t1+1 Action/n/f24/t0/s22Choose one; you get the version/nin parentheses: Each player gets/n+1(+3) Cards; or each player/ngains a Silver (Gold); or each/nplayer may trash a card from his/nhand and gain a card costing/nexactly /c01(/c02) more.

golem.text.message: /h-1Reveal cards from your deck until/nyou reveal 2 Action cards other than/nGolem cards./nDiscard the other cards, then play the/nAction cards in either order.

walledVillage.text.message: /f30/t1+1 Card/n+2 Actions/l/f24/t0/s21At the start of Clean-up, if you/nhave this and no more than one/nother Action card in play, you/nmay put this on top of your deck.

conspirator.text.message: /s60+/c02/n/s30If you've played 3 or more/nActions  this turn (counting this):/n +1 Card, +1 Action.

mercenary.text.message:
You may trash 2 cards from/n
your hand./nIf you do, +2 Cards, +/c02,/nand each other player discards/ndown to 3 cards in hand./n
/t2(This is not in the Supply.)

sirBailey.text.message: /f30/s24/t1+1 Card/n+1 Action/f24/h-1/n/t0Each other player reveals the top/n2 cards of his deck, trashes one/nof them costing from /c03 to /c06,/nand discards the rest. If a Knight is/ntrashed by this, trash this card.

forge.text.message: Trash any number of cards from/nyour hand. Gain a card with cost/nexactly equal to the total cost/nin coins of the trashed cards.

junkDealer.text.message:
/f30/t1+1 Card/n+1 Action/n+/c01/n/s60/f24/t0
Trash a card from your hand.

hornOfPlenty.text.message: /s10/C00/n/s24/f23/h-1When you play this, gain a card/ncosting up to/c01per differently/nnamed card you have in play, counting/nthis. If it’s a Victory card, trash this.
